name: height
label: Height
description: Defines the height of the separator in HTML/CSS format (auto by default).

name: colorFill
label: Fill color
description: Color fill of the separator (there is no fill by default).

name: margin
label: Margin
description: Defines the external indentation on all four sides of the separator in HTML/CSS format (0 by default).

name: padding
label: Padding
description: Defines the internal indentation on all four sides of the separator in HTML/CSS format (0 by default).
